title.native: Fairy蘭丸～あなたの心お助けします～
title.romaji: Fairy Ranmaru: Anata no Kokoro Otasuke Shimasu

description:
This world is all about do or die. There ain't no paradise. You go down once and you're out. This world is filled with people who suffer believing that. Hey, you there. Are you really going to pretend not to notice? We, however, cannot do that. Let us wipe away your tears. We'll put that smile back on your face. But it's not going to be for free. Please come by Bar F. Have no fear. We don't need any money. There's only one thing that we want... "We'll take your heart!!"

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: แฟร์รี่ รันมารุ จะช่วยหัวใจเธอเอง

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.description: Prominently features romance between two males, not inherently sexual.

tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

name.native: ブリドカット・セーラ・恵美

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1321375616)

Originating from Studio Dove. 

Formerly affiliated with Studio Gao, joined alongside former Dove employees [Ryoutarou Akao](https://anilist.co/staff/133754/Ryoutarou-Akao) and [Kazuhiro Ono](https://anilist.co/staff/156935/Kazuhiro-Ono).

Mentored by [Akira Takahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/112045/Akira-Takahashi) at Dove, stayed in touch after leaving the studio.

Changed his name from 石川哲也 to 石川てつや around 2007 to better differentiate between his and the older animator's credits.

_Note: Not to be confused with an older animator with the same name [Tetsuya Ishikawa](https://anilist.co/staff/360580)._
**Hayato Numajiri** is a Japanese CG director.
Youko Kogawa is a Japanese producer and planner working at Pony Canyon.
